ovdesc.p: This is used as a Template Tester and is used to test the generic functionality of the template application. Upto 20 characters are allowed.

desc.p: Optional input . Upto 10 characters are allowed.
Optional numeric value. Upto 5 characters are allowed.
EXTERN field. Upto 20 characters are allowed.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
The input allowed in this field are VALUE1,VALUE2,VALUE3 or can be left blank .
Should be a valid record in the EB.SYSTEM.ID application. Upto 4 characters are allowed.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
